REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C L f0511 reute u f BC-PEORIA-HOGS-SEEN-STEA 04-07 0078

TEXT.TITLE: PEORIA HOGS SEEN STEADY/UP 0.50 DLR - PRIVATE
TEXT.BODY: Hog prices are expected steady to 0.50 dlr higher on estimated receipts of 2,000 head, private sources said. Top seen at 51.00 to 51.50 dlrs per cwt. Sources said the market closed stronger late yesterday and was expected to carry over into today's session. "Farmers are getting in the fields here," they said. Also, little if any country movement was expected, they added. Reuter
